sentences.sentence: The profiles will be switched according to the schedule (compo sed in this view).
sentences.translation: 剖面将切换根据时间表(包括在此视图)。

sentences.sentence: The advances in research and development of molecular compo-sites are discussed in this paper.
sentences.translation: 论述了几类分子复合材料的研究与开发进展。

sentences.sentence: To overcome this problem, the zeolite can be modified with amorphous cracking component to form a compo - site catalyst.
sentences.translation: 为了解决这个问题，可以用无定形裂化组分对沸石进行改性而制成一种复合催化剂。
